definition: To limit or restrict something, often used to describe setting boundaries or confining actions within certain parameters. It is commonly employed when discussing the act of imposing constraints or reducing the scope of something.

examples.english: I need to limit my expenses.
The number of participants is limited to 20.

examples.german: Wir sollten uns auf das Wesentliche beschränken.
examples.english: We should focus on the essentials.

examples.german: Die Freiheit des Einzelnen endet dort, wo die Rechte anderer beschränkt werden.
examples.english: The freedom of the individual ends where the rights of others are restricted.

examples.german: Die Nutzung des Parks ist zeitlich beschränkt.
examples.english: The use of the park is limited in time.
